CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PzNDTTPD - This is a polymer with "Pz" as the prefix, indicating that it is a polymer of some unknown material. The rest of the name, "NDTTPD", is likely a specific name or abbreviation for this material.
2. PC71BM - This is a chemical compound with the prefix "PC", indicating that it is a polymer of some unknown material. The rest of the name, "71BM", is likely a specific name or abbreviation for this material.
3. NDT - This is likely a specific name or abbreviation for a material, as it appears in the context of comparing it to "PzNDTTPD".
4. TPD - This is likely a specific name or abbreviation for a material, as it appears in the context of comparing it to "PzNDTTPD".
5. PNDTTPD - This is a polymer with "PND" as the prefix, indicating that it is a polymer of some unknown material. The rest of the name, "TTPD", is likely a specific name or abbreviation for this material.
6. PCE - This is an abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency", which is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell or other energy conversion device.
7. V oc - This is an abbreviation for "open circuit voltage", which is a measure of the maximum voltage that a solar cell can achieve under ideal conditions.
8. hole mobility - This is a measure of the mobility of holes in a semiconductor material, which is a measure of how easily holes can move through the material.
9. on / off current ratio - This is a measure of the ratio of the current that flows through a transistor when it is turned on to the current that flows through it when it is turned off.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph:

1. PzNDTTPD
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that are specifically referred to as "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities referred to as "Material Name" in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTTPD |
| PC71BM |

7. V oc - Property Name: Voltage (V oc)

9. on / off current ratio - Property Name: Performance (on / off current ratio)

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are: PSCs, PzNDTTPD, PC71BM, NDT, TPD, PCE, V oc, PNDTTPD, and on / off current ratio.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Let's identify the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency): This is the percentage of sunlight converted into electrical energy by the solar cells.
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage): This is the maximum voltage that the solar cells can achieve when there is no load connected to them.
3. Hole mobility: This is a measure of how quickly holes (positive charge carriers) can move within the solar cells.
4. On/off current ratio: This is a measure of the ratio of the current flowing through the transistors when they are on to the current flowing through them when they are off.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE: 5.26%
2. V oc: 0.91 V
3. Hole mobility: 0.067 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1
4. On/off current ratio: 10^9 - 10^10
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency): This is the percentage of sunlight converted into electrical energy by the solar cells.
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage): This is the maximum voltage that the solar cells can achieve when there is no load connected to them.

So, the relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE: 5.26%
2. V oc: 0.91 V

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) | 5.26% |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) | 0.91 V |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
